# 07 Images + Links

Images can load asynchronously and change layout heights.
In local directory mode, remote images may not load reliably, so this file uses embedded (data URI) SVG images.

[[M:07.01]]

## Links

- Link A: https://example.com/
- Link B: https://example.com/some/long/path?with=query&params=true
- Link C: https://example.com/a/b/c/d/e/f/g/h/i/j?k=1&k=2&k=3

Paragraph after links. Paragraph after links. Paragraph after links. Paragraph after links.

[[M:07.02]]

## Image A (Embedded)

![Embedded image A](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Paragraph after image A. This should create a noticeable region in preview height because the image is large.

Paragraph after image A (continued). More text. More text. More text. More text.

[[M:07.03]]

## Image B (Embedded, Tall)

![Embedded image B](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Paragraph after image B. This section should be tall enough that it dominates scroll position in preview.

Paragraph after image B (continued). More text. More text. More text.

[[M:07.03B]]

![Embedded image A again](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Paragraph after second Image A.

[[M:07.04]]

## Mixed content

A paragraph with inline `code` and a link: https://example.com/

Another paragraph. Another paragraph. Another paragraph. Another paragraph. Another paragraph.

[[M:07.05]]

Final long paragraph: repeat to ensure the file scrolls even with large images present. Repeat to ensure the file scrolls even with large images present. Repeat to ensure the file scrolls even with large images present.
